jobDescription: Sunrise Futures is an industry leading proprietary trading company based in Chicago, IL that specializes in quantitative model based trading strategies. We seek highly talented quantitative researchers with an entrepreneurial spirit to join our strategy research team.  Sunrise Futures leaders are pioneers in algorithmic trading strategy development and have extensive experience in various senior positions in leading financial institutions. We offer our employees a team environment where you can learn from leaders in the field and have the opportunity to utilize your talents for rapid career growth.  We offer extremely competitive compensation including a performance-based bonus.
